name: Scarlet: New Shade
description:
Current dev news:

We are rewriting this game in an engine built in-house. The development team is expanding as this game has grown too large for one person.

This is a game about interacting with other villagers and gathering resources. 

The inspiration was from playing Stardew Valley and Animal Crossing (specifically New Horizons). I am  this game to have the immersive in found in both games, and have the massive amounts of lore found in Stardew Valley.

I connected this game to my story universe, so it takes place on a planet in the Colormatic Expanded Universe (CEU). There are currently a few noticeable connections (namely the currency: weights) and there are more to come.
